song.englishname: A Pretty Girl Never Lights Her Own Cigarette

english.segment1: boy: "So many things that I want to say, but I don't want to scare you away. So many things use could do, if: Wasn't so far away from you.". girl: "You walk away.". Nararator: She kissed him until he cried. Broke his heart and then he died. She packed up and followed that old a-line. Where the colors fly. boy: "You walk away.". girl: "Don't act so surprised, you can't hide behind. Those eyes, you do it to me every. Time, but I'm stepping out.". boy: "I'm not that surprisd, I could see. Right through your eyes, I went along. For the ride, but I'm stepping out.".
